mapper.select: select student_no , student_id , student_pwd , student_name , student_ssn , s_phone , s_email , s_address , enroll_date , absence_date , grad_date from student where student_id = #{studentId} and s_status = 'Y'
select student_no , abs_semester , abs_grade , abs_sort from absence join student on (student_no = abs_no) where s_status = 'Y'
select student_id from student where s_email = #{stEmail}

select course_no , class_num , class_grade , course_semester , course_year , class_name , class_room , class_time , class_score from course join class using (class_num) where student_id = #{studentId} and course_year = '2024'

select course_no , class_num , class_grade , course_semester , class_name , class_room , class_time , class_score from course join class using (class_num) where course_year = 2024 and class_num = #{courseNum}
